subject: Welcome
content: Hello how are you doing today!

subject: Meeting Reminder
content: Don't forget our meeting pleaseee

subject: Project Update
content: Project is on track, great job!!

subject: Invoice
content: Please find attached invoice

subject: Newsletter
content: This month's newsletter, with cool things!

subject: Job Application Status
content: You're hired! Welcome to the team

subject: Event Invitation
content: You're invited to our event

subject: Promotion
content: Special offer just for you

subject: Feedback Request
content: We value your feedback

subject: System Alert
content: Important system update

subject: Holiday Plans
content: What are your holiday plans this year? Let's catch up soon!

subject: Password Reset
content: You requested a password reset. Click the link below to proceed.

subject: Team Outing
content: We are planning a team outing next Friday. Make sure to RSVP by this week!

subject: Weekly Report
content: Here is the weekly report for your review. Please provide feedback.

subject: Birthday Reminder
content: It's John's birthday next week! Don’t forget to wish him.

subject: Survey Participation
content: Please participate in our survey. Your feedback matters!

subject: Project Delay
content: Due to unforeseen circumstances, the project will be delayed by two weeks.

subject: Security Alert
content: We detected suspicious activity on your account. Please review immediately.

subject: Client Feedback
content: The client has provided positive feedback on the last deliverable.

subject: Meeting Rescheduled
content: The meeting has been rescheduled to next Monday at 10 AM.

subject: Job Offer
content: Congratulations! We are excited to extend you an offer to join our company.

subject: Discount Code
content: Here's your exclusive discount code for 20% off your next purchase!

subject: Conference Reminder
content: Reminder: The annual tech conference starts tomorrow. Don’t forget to attend.

subject: New Features
content: Check out the new features we've added to the app. We hope you enjoy them!

subject: System Maintenance
content: There will be scheduled system maintenance on Saturday at 1 AM. Services may be unavailable for a few hours.

subject: Employee Survey
content: We are conducting an internal survey to improve workplace conditions. Please take a few minutes to fill it out.

subject: Promotion Announcement
content: We are thrilled to announce that you have been promoted to Senior Manager. Congratulations on your achievement!

subject: Payment Confirmation
content: Your payment has been successfully processed. Thank you for your business.

subject: Training Session
content: Reminder: Your training session is scheduled for this Thursday at 2 PM.

subject: Account Deactivation
content: Your account will be deactivated if there is no activity within the next 30 days. Please log in to keep it active.

subject: Vacation Request Approved
content: Your vacation request for the dates you submitted has been approved. Enjoy your time off!

subject: Annual Performance Review
content: Your annual performance review has been scheduled for next Tuesday at 11 AM. Please prepare accordingly.

subject: New Policy Update
content: We have updated our company policies regarding remote work. Please review the changes.

subject: Webinar Invitation
content: You're invited to attend a special webinar on productivity hacks next Wednesday. Register now to reserve your spot!

subject: Happy Hour Reminder
content: Don’t forget about the team happy hour this Friday at 6 PM. See you there!

subject: Document Expiration Notice
content: One of your important documents is about to expire. Please renew it before the deadline.

subject: New Task Assigned
content: You have been assigned a new task. Please check your task list for details.

subject: Client Meeting Follow-Up
content: Here is a summary of the action items from our recent client meeting. Please review and provide any feedback.

subject: Weather Alert
content: Severe weather is expected in your area over the next few days. Stay safe and take necessary precautions.

subject: Password Expiration Notice
content: Your password will expire in 7 days. Please update it to ensure continued access to your account.
